title: OneDrop - Blood Donation Platform
description: A role-based blood donation platform connecting donors, volunteers, and admins. It enables efficient management of donation requests, user profiles, and blogs through a responsive dashboard.

title: StoryStack - Blogging Platform
description: A dynamic blogging platform with features like text editing, search, comment system, and category filtering. It offers user authentication, blog management, and a responsive user interface.

title: IngiFund - Crowdfunding Platform
description: A simplified crowdfunding web app where users can create, view, and fund campaigns. It provides user authentication, campaign management, and a responsive UI with theme toggling.

title: GadgetHeaven - E-commerce Website
description: A e-commerce web app for discovering and purchasing gadgets. Users can manage their cart, wishlist, and explore products by category with a smooth UI.
